page.title: 08Birthday parties.
page.content: Birthday parties are held in your house or in the village hall.First everyone plays games like Pass the Parcel,or Musical Bumps.In Pass the Parcel a prize is wrapped in many layers of paper.Children sit in a cicle and music is played.When the music stops the person holding the parcel unwraps it.The game continues until someone takes off the last layer and wins the prize.In Musical Bumps,people dance to music and when it stops everyone must sit on the floor the last down is out.When the games are over everyone eats.Usually there are sandwiches, crisps, sausages, cakes, jellies and ice cream.Sometimes instead of parties small groups of friends go to a cafe for a meal or go swimming or roller skating.
